text: @smitd28 @DiGeremias @_RobbieMoore @AireIncinerator @EnvAgency @IlkleyChat Fair enough any planning permission is decided by the council and voted on which could of been rejected which they didn’t at this case, so again it’s the council at fault whatever story your making up to cover up this fact.

Take your knowledge further with a Flood and Coastal Engineering MSc. 

Scholarships are available, full time for one year starting in September 2021 and will include a 3 month work placement at the @EnvAgency (subject to terms and conditions).

Apply now: https://t.co/qatD7dFz4V https://t.co/FyZCbiKY1s

Rickerby page: https://t.co/VIsDGvK1LF https://t.co/5StTOrDB83

text: Fascinating to hear from @SaleemulHuq and Bangladesh’s world class cyclone warning system and how we can learn from countries across the globe @floodandcoast @EnvAgency https://t.co/PrxL2VJOjk

Our first speaker today is @CvNieuwenhuizen. She points to the global climate risk index https://t.co/absM8xhUlD as an impactful tool to illustrate the range and depth of climate risk across the world. #FloodandCoast2020 @EnvAgency

.@EmmaHowardBoyd champions the importance of resilience within the new @EnvAgency FCERM strategy and a new £200m innovation fund for resilience. Resilience measures have huge returns on investment and have massive benefits for communities the world over. #FloodandCoast2020

urls.title: OneLink.To
urls.description: When there are no download links configured or the onelink URL is not registered to an account, fallback will not to be automatic. This is a security measure to deter uninteded use of the onelink.to service. onelink.to is the easy way to link to your app! With onelink.to you get one link or QR code to your app, no matter if it's on Apple AppStore, Google Play, Blackberry Appworld, Windows Marketplace, or Amazon Appstore for Kindle Fire. Instead of printing several QR codes or having several separate
